scripts.migration:gen:sqlite: rimraf dist && pnpm run build && typeorm -d dist/database/migrations/sqlite.migration-config.js migration:generate -p
scripts.migration:run:sqlite: rimraf dist && pnpm run build && typeorm -d dist/database/migrations/sqlite.migration-config.js migration:run
scripts.migration:revert:sqlite: rimraf dist && pnpm run build && typeorm -d dist/database/migrations/sqlite.migration-config.js migration:revert
scripts.migration:gen:postgres: rimraf dist && pnpm run build && typeorm -d dist/database/migrations/postgres.migration-config.js migration:generate -p
scripts.migration:run:postgres: rimraf dist && pnpm run build && typeorm -d dist/database/migrations/postgres.migration-config.js migration:run
scripts.migration:revert:postgres: rimraf dist && pnpm run build && typeorm -d dist/database/migrations/postgres.migration-config.js migration:revert

simple-git-hooks.pre-commit: pnpm run format && pnpm run lint
